/*
jai shree ram _/\_
A hacker from NITP
*/

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define mod 1000000007
typedef set<string> ss;
typedef vector<int> vs;
typedef map<int,char> msi;
typedef pair<int,int> pa;

char str[4000001];
int ans[4000003];
int main()
{
	
	int l,i;
	cin>>str;
	while(strcmp(str,"End"))
	{
		l=strlen(str);
		int m=0,p=-1;
		ans[m]=p;
		while(m<l)
		{
			while(p>=0 && str[m]!=str[p]) p=ans[p];
			m++; p++;
			ans[m]=p;
			cout<<ans[m]<<" ";
		}
		cout<<"\n";
		cin>>str;
	}
	return 0;
}
